data.title: British Film Actors
data.meta_description: Geni Project: British Film Actors. British Film Actors This is a list of notable actresses and male actors from the United Kingdom. This lis
data.text:
This is a list of notable actresses and male actors from the United Kingdom. This list includes acting people of film, radio, stage and television.

Please take the time to link GENi profiles to the names in the following lists (using bold links), and add unlisted British film actors and actresses who are not yet included. How to add a link is explained in the document - Adding links to Geni profiles in projects.
